properties.name: app.jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret value used for getting algorithm that signs JWT.

properties.name: app.security.permitall
properties.description: Allows access to all URLs of the application.

properties.name: app.security.maximumLoginAttempts
properties.description: Maximum number of login attempts before locking user account.

properties.name: app.security.loginAttemptsExpiration
properties.description: Number of minutes after which login attempts cache expires for an entry.

properties.name: app.security.loginAttemptsCacheLimit
properties.description: The maximum number of entries the login attempts cache may contain.
